move_details.name: freeze-dry
move_details.effect_description: Inflicts regular damage.  This move is super-effective against the water type.  The target’s other type will affect damage as usual.  If this move’s type is changed, it remains super-effective against Water regardless of its type.
move_details.flavor_text: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.
